Name: Walter Langton
Notes:
Doncaster's longest serving player
Appearance stats don't include seasons 1887–1901 nor 1903–04 which are likely to put his total appearances over 400

Name: Tom Keetley
Notes:
Record all time goalscorer.
Most goals in one game – 6 v Ashington in 1929

Name: Fred Emery
Notes:
Record league appearances
Manager of Doncaster 1936–1940

Name: Paddy McConnell
Notes: The first current Doncaster player to represent his country at international level, Paddy played for Ireland

Name: Syd Bycroft
Notes:
Including Wartime League matches, he played 501 games for Doncaster giving him the overall all-time record number of appearances.
Joint manager of Doncaster January–June 1958

Name: Clarrie Jordan
Notes: Most Doncaster league goals in one season (42 in 1946/47)

Name: Peter Doherty
Notes:
Ireland international player and manager of Northern Ireland whilst at Doncaster
Manager of Doncaster 1949–1958 (PM until 1953)

Name: Len Graham
Notes: Northern Ireland international whilst at Doncaster

Name: Kit Lawlor
Notes: Republic of Ireland international whilst at Doncaster

Name: Harry Gregg
Notes:
Northern Ireland international whilst at Doncaster.
Hero of the Munich air disaster

Name: Alick Jeffrey
Notes: Youngest Doncaster player (15 years 229 days v Fulham, 15 September 1954).

Name: Colin Douglas
Notes:
Record total appearances (not including the Wartime League games).
Forward in his first spell, fullback in his second
